statusLine.command: input=$(cat); user=$(python3 ~/.dotfiles/bin/claude-user-status.py 2>/dev/null); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cwd // .workspace.current_dir // empty'); dispdir=$(echo "$dir" | sed 's|^/c/users/oystein|~|'); branch=$(git -C "$dir" symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git -C "$dir" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); printf '%s %s' "$user" "$dispdir"; [ -n "$branch" ] && printf ' (%s)' "$branch"; echo
